name: DunGen (itch)
description:
Get The Loot!

A massive treasure hoard has recently been discovered and many say that the dungeon goes on for ever. Take control of The Assassin, The Knight, or the Adventurer and try and grab as much loot as you can. But beware, as you are not alone in the dungeon. The Phantom Knight and his minions are not too keen to give up their long hoarded treasure. Be prepared for battle, and bring a big backpack.

Patching

While DunGen is completely playable in it's current state, the game is still in development, and new content will be released regularly. The game also will continue to be polished, and bugs will be fixed along the way. Anyone who has purchased the game will be able to download these patches once they are released.

Latest PatchVersion 1.03
  • Added some special thanks to the credits
  • Resolved a big stability bug that crashed the game upon loading new levels.
  • More code additions for future releases
Controls

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
Primary Attack / Menu Navigation - Left Mouse Button
Secondary Attack - Right Mouse Button
Open Inventory - E
Pause / Quit - Escape
